source_attribution.search_query: (BTC OR ETH OR SOL OR bitcoin OR ethereum OR solana OR altcoin) crypto regime transitions trading

hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Regime Transition via BTC Dominance Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: When the market is in NEUTRAL regime (confidence >60%) and BTC dominance (BTC.D) experiences a sharp 3-day decline of >2% while BTC price remains within ±3% range, a rotation into high-beta altcoins (SOL, AVAX) will outperform BTC over the next 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes often precede bull transitions. Sharp BTC.D declines while BTC is range-bound suggests capital rotation into alts before broader breakout. High-beta coins typically lead during early bull phases.
entry_conditions: Enter long SOL/USD and AVAX/USD at market open following signal

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5-day holding period OR 15% unrealized gain on either position
exit_conditions.time_exit: Close all positions after 5 trading days regardless of PnL

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median 5-day return of SOL+AVAX basket underperforms BTC by >3% across 20+ historical instances.
